title: Drawing, "Long's Eddy, Grand Manan Island, Canada", September 1851
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on cream-colored paper
markings: Part of an impressed watermark: Caduceus, flanked by E and B in shield.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with figures at various locations; at top: Lont's Eddy - Grand Manan I. - Sep. / At Wm Cronk's.   2 Grey Rock / 3 Grass and earth reddish / (road) / 4 Grass greener.  / 5 overgrown with / Rock weed Beach / 6 Indian encampment [The West direction is indicated.
description: Horizontal view of a rocky, hilly coast show obliquely in the middle and back planes as a long house stands where a land tongue projects, the front of which is low and partially filled with water.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Long's Eddy, Grand Manan Island, Canada", September 1851.
September 1851. Graphite, brush and white gouache on cream-colored paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-41.
